info.name: Detect Deprecated XSS Protection Header
author: joshlarsen
info.description: Setting the XSS-Protection header is deprecated by most browsers. Setting the header to anything other than `0` can actually introduce an XSS vulnerability.

request:
GET / HTTP/1.1
Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response: HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Content-Length: 707 Accept-Ranges: bytes Cache-Control: public, max-age=0 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'self' https://api.github.com https://raw.githubusercontent.com https://sentry.incubateur.net *.gouv.fr;frame-src 'self' https://stats.data.gouv.fr;img-src 'self' data: https://avatars.githubusercontent.com/ https://raw.githubusercontent.com;script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://stats.data.gouv.fr;base-uri 'self';block-all-mixed-content;font-src 'self' https: data:;form-action 'self';frame-ancestors 'self';object-src 'none';script-src-attr 'none';style-src 'self' https: 'unsafe-inline';upgrade-insecure-requests Content-Type: text/html; charset=UTF-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 17 Jul 2022 04:07:34 GMT Etag: W/"2c3-181f7fa9ef0" Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Last-Modified: Wed, 13 Jul 2022 14:33:26 GMT Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Request-Id: 78940c8c-d1f6-4552-b4fc-1da327653c84 X-Xss-Protection: 1; mode=block Ecobalyse

info.name: WAF Detection
author: dwisiswant0
lu4nx
info.description: A web application firewall was detected.

request:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr
User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)
Connection: close
Content-Length: 27
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
Accept-Encoding: gzip

_=<script>alert(1)</script>
response:
HTTP/1.1 404 Not Found Connection: close Content-Length: 140 Content-Security-Policy: default-src 'none' Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy: same-origin Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy: same-origin Date: Sun, 17 Jul 2022 04:07:37 GMT Expect-Ct: max-age=0 Origin-Agent-Cluster: ?1 Referrer-Policy: no-referrer Strict-Transport-Security: max-age=31536000 X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff X-Dns-Prefetch-Control: off X-Download-Options: noopen X-Frame-Options: SAMEORIGIN X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies: none X-Request-Id: bdecae7c-8e71-4478-a4a9-f062d13110ce Error 
Cannot POST /
curl-command: curl -X 'POST' -d '_=<script>alert(1)</script>' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' -H 'Host: ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr' -H 'User-Agent: Nuclei - Open-source project (github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei)' 'https://ecobalyse.beta.gouv.fr/'
